videos.description: Kentucky's Malik Monk passes the ball down low to Edrice Adebayo, who maneuvers around a defender for a first-half dunk against Mississippi State.
videos.headline: Adebayo dunks it off Monk's assist

videos.description: Kentucky's De'Aaron Fox uses a quick first step and speeds into the paint for a first-half layup against Mississippi State.
videos.headline: Kentucky's Fox speeds past D for layup

videos.description: S. Herard made Dunk. Assisted by Q. Weatherspoon.
videos.headline: Great pass from Weatherspoon sets up a big Herard dunk for the Bulldogs

videos.description: Off the Mississippi State turnover, Kentucky's Isaiah Briscoe speeds down the court before passing the ball to Derek Willis, who scores with a two-handed dunk to give him 11 first-half points.
videos.headline: Willis jams it down off Briscoe's feed

videos.description: Kentucky head coach John Calipari talks about his team's foul situation heading into the locker room
videos.headline: Kentucky head coach John Calipari talks about his team's foul situation heading into the locker room

videos.description: Kentucky shows off some great passing in transition as the ball gets up to Isaiah Briscoe in a hurry for a layup.
videos.headline: Kentucky's Briscoe scores quick transition layup

videos.description: Kentucky's Malik Monk scores with a beautiful alley-oop dunk but gets called for a technical foul for hanging on the rim for too long.
videos.headline: Monk gets technical for hanging on rim

videos.description: L. Peters made Three Point Jumper.
videos.headline: Peters three pointer brings Mississippi State within four vs. Kentucky

videos.description: Kentucky's De'Aaron Fox steals the ball from Mississippi State and dribbles up the court before lobbing it up to Malik Monk for a dunk.
videos.headline: Fox serves it up for a Monk alley-oop jam

videos.description: Kentucky's De'Aaron Fox shows off his dribbling skills and speed by getting past the Mississippi State defense for a second-half dunk.
videos.headline: Fox splits the D and slams it home

videos.description: Postgame breakdown of Kentucky's 88-81 victory over Mississippi State
videos.headline: Postgame breakdown of Kentucky's 88-81 victory over Mississippi State

videos.description: De'Aaron Fox records 21 points, five rebounds and five assists as No. 5 Kentucky wins on the road against Mississippi State 88-81.
videos.headline: Fox leads Kentucky past Mississippi State
